casebody.data:
Kenneth R. WILSON, Movant/Appellant,
v.
STATE of Missouri, Respondent. No. ED 105598 Missouri Court of Appeals, Eastern District, DIVISION FOUR. FILED: April 10, 2018 FOR APPELLANT: Edward S. Thompson, 1010 Market Street, Suite 1100, St. Louis, Missouri 63101. FOR RESPONDENT: Shaun J. Mackelprang, P.O. Box 899, Jefferson City, Missouri 65102. Before Colleen Dolan, P.J., Mary K. Hoff, J., and Lisa S. Van Amburg, J.

ORDER

PER CURIAM

Kenneth R. Wilson appeals from the judgment of the circuit court denying, after an evidentiary hearing, his Rule 29.15 motion for post-conviction relief. Finding no error, we affirm.

We have reviewed the briefs of the parties and the record on appeal and find no error of law. No jurisprudential purpose would be served by a written opinion. However, the parties have been furnished with a memorandum opinion for their information only, setting forth the facts and reasons for this order.

The judgment of the trial court is affirmed in accordance with Rule 84.16(b).
